messages: /He's all squished up next to his kids and he doesn't even seem to notice./

Sorry kids.
Have fun paying up.
/He's all squished up next to his kids and he doesn't even seem to notice./

@vodka4wolves - has an effect on me. /He sits up slowly as he tilts his head up to give the hand stroking his hair a kiss./
